This website documents analysis for the paper titled `Refined Approaches for Missing Data Imputation Enhance Quantitative Trait Loci Discovery in Multi-Omics Analysis`. 

See [here](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.11.29.23299181v1) for the paper. 


**Analyses:**

+ [Compare imputation accuracy for different methods on omics data](imputation_accuracy_benchmark.html)

+ [Compare QTL performance for different methods on simulated data](qtl_simulation.html)

+ [Compare QTL performance for different methods on real omics data](real_data_xqtl.html)

+ [Compare QTL performance for different methods based on xQTL replication](xqtl_replication.html)
